targets.expr: sum by(project_name) (libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"})
sum(openstack_nova_vcpus_used{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"}) / sum(openstack_nova_vcpus_available{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"}) * 100
sum(openstack_nova_memory_used_bytes{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"}) / sum(openstack_nova_memory_available_bytes{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"}) * 100

sum(${ceph_without_ephemeral} * ((ceph_cluster_total_used_bytes or vector(0)) / clamp_min((ceph_cluster_total_bytes or vector(0)), 1) * 100)) + ((1 - ${ceph_without_ephemeral}) * (sum(openstack_nova_local_storage_used_bytes{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"}) / sum(openstack_nova_local_storage_available_bytes{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"}) * 100))
sum(openstack_nova_vcpus_used{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"})
sum(openstack_nova_vcpus_available{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"})
sum(openstack_nova_memory_used_bytes{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"})
sum(openstack_nova_memory_available_bytes{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"})
sum(openstack_nova_local_storage_used_bytes{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"})
sum(${ceph_without_ephemeral} * (ceph_cluster_total_bytes or vector(0))) + ((1 - ${ceph_without_ephemeral}) * sum(openstack_nova_local_storage_available_bytes{hostname=~"$hypervisor.*"}))
rate(libvirt_domain_info_cpu_time_seconds_total[$__rate_interval]) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid, flavor) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}
libvirt_domain_info_memory_usage_bytes * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid, flavor) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

(sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_receive_bytes_total[$__rate_interval])) + sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_transmit_bytes_total[$__rate_interval]))) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid, flavor) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

(sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_receive_packets_total[$__rate_interval])) + sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_transmit_packets_total[$__rate_interval]))) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid, flavor) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

(sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_receive_errors_total[$__rate_interval])) + sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_transmit_errors_total[$__rate_interval]))) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid, flavor) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

(sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_receive_drops_total[$__rate_interval])) + sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_transmit_drops_total[$__rate_interval]))) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid, flavor) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

(sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_block_stats_read_requests_total[$__rate_interval])) + sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_block_stats_write_requests_total[$__rate_interval]))) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid, flavor) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

(sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_block_stats_read_bytes_total[$__rate_interval])) + sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_block_stats_write_bytes_total[$__rate_interval]))) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid, flavor) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

panels.description: CPU time used by the domain - rate over time

targets.expr: rate(libvirt_domain_info_cpu_time_seconds_total[$__rate_interval]) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid, flavor) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

panels.title: CPU Time

targets.expr: sum by(juju_unit) (libvirt_domain_info_memory_usage_bytes)
libvirt_domain_info_memory_usage_bytes * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid, flavor) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}
libvirt_domain_info_maximum_memory_bytes * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid, flavor) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

panels.description: Network traffic in bytes, rate over time, receive/transmit per instance, cumulative over all interfaces

targets.expr: sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_receive_bytes_total[$__rate_interval])) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid, flavor) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_transmit_bytes_total[$__rate_interval])) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid, flavor) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

panels.title: Instance Network Throughput

panels.description: Network traffic in packets, rate over time, receive/transmit per instance, cumulative over all interfaces

targets.expr: sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_receive_packets_total[$__rate_interval])) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid, flavor) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_transmit_packets_total[$__rate_interval])) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid, flavor) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

panels.title: Instance Packet Rate

panels.description: Total network throughput rates per hypervisor, rate over time

targets.expr: sum by(juju_unit) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_receive_bytes_total[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(juju_unit) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_transmit_bytes_total[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Cumulative Network Throughput

panels.description: Total network throughput rates per hypervisor, rate over time

targets.expr: sum by(juju_unit) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_receive_packets_total[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(juju_unit) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_transmit_packets_total[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Cumulative Packet Rate

panels.description: Instance errors and drops, transmit and receive. Rate over time

targets.expr: sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_receive_errors_total[$__rate_interval])) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid, flavor) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_transmit_errors_total[$__rate_interval])) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid, flavor) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_receive_drops_total[$__rate_interval])) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid, flavor) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

sum by(juju_unit, domain) (rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_transmit_drops_total[$__rate_interval])) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid, flavor) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

panels.title: Instance Errors and Drops

panels.description: Instance block dev read request rate over time

targets.expr: sum by(juju_unit, domain, target_device) (rate(libvirt_domain_block_stats_read_requests_total[$__rate_interval])) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid, flavor) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

panels.title: IOPS Read

panels.description: Instance block dev write request rate over time

targets.expr: sum by(juju_unit, domain, target_device) (rate(libvirt_domain_block_stats_write_requests_total[$__rate_interval])) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid, flavor) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

panels.title: IOPS Write

panels.description: Instance block device read bytes rate over time

targets.expr: sum by(juju_unit, domain, target_device) (rate(libvirt_domain_block_stats_read_bytes_total[$__rate_interval])) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid, flavor) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

panels.title: Throughput Read

panels.description: Instance block device write bytes rate over time

targets.expr: sum by(juju_unit, domain, target_device) (rate(libvirt_domain_block_stats_write_bytes_total[$__rate_interval])) * on(juju_unit, domain) group_left(project_name, instance_name, uuid, flavor) libvirt_domain_info_meta{project_name=~"$project"}

panels.title: Throughput Write

list.definition: query_result(max(((ceph_cluster_total_bytes or vector(0)) > bool(0)) * scalar(stddev(openstack_nova_local_storage_available_bytes) < bool(1e8)) * scalar(abs(sum(ceph_cluster_total_bytes or vector(0)) - max(openstack_nova_local_storage_available_bytes)) < bool(5e9))))
list.description: Detect if Ceph is used as shared backend storage (no ephemeral available)
list.label: Ceph Shared Storage
list.name: ceph_without_ephemeral

query.query: query_result(max(((ceph_cluster_total_bytes or vector(0)) > bool(0)) * scalar(stddev(openstack_nova_local_storage_available_bytes) < bool(1e8)) * scalar(abs(sum(ceph_cluster_total_bytes or vector(0)) - max(openstack_nova_local_storage_available_bytes)) < bool(5e9))))
